name: Hyss
description: Angry fairies, a kidnapped herd of cows and a devastated cow queen. Play as Vilde and Grusa, throw Ms. Cowknight and solve the fairiesâ€™ tricky puzzles to save the kidnapped cows. Hyss is a lighthearted puzzle adventure with focus on platforming, puzzle solving and throwing cows.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 or AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 560 or Radeon 6850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1118 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1118 MB available space
